description.english: Use a sponge to clean a trinket.
description.german: Schrubbe Klimbim mit dem Schwamm.
description.french: Utiliser une éponge pour nettoyer une babiole.
description.italian: Usa una spugna per pulire un ammennicolo.
description.spanish: Usa una esponja para limpiar una baratija.
description.russian: Начисто протрите вещицу губкой.
description.brazilian: Use a esponja para limpar uma bugiganga.

description.english: Use a chisel to uncover a trinket.
description.german: Lege Klimbim mit dem Meißel frei.
description.french: Utiliser un burin pour découvrir une babiole.
description.italian: Usa uno scalpello per scoprire un ammennicolo.
description.spanish: Usa un cincel para descubrir una baratija.
description.russian: Сбейте блоки долотом и вытащите вещицу.
description.brazilian: Use o cinzel para descobrir uma bugiganga.

description.english: Use the upcycler to create a unique trinket.
description.german: Erschaffe neuen Klimbim mit dem Aufbesserer.
description.french: Utiliser le surcycleur pour créer une babiole unique.
description.italian: Usa la pinza riqualificante per creare un ammennicolo unico.
description.spanish: Usa el supraciclador para crear una baratija única.
description.russian: Создайте уникальную вещицу с помощью ремонтного инструмента.
description.polish: Użyj przerabiacza, aby stworzyć unikalne świecidełko.
description.brazilian: Use o renovador para criar uma bugiganga única.

description.english: Sell a trinket to a customer.
description.german: Verkaufe Klimbim an Kundschaft.
description.french: Vendre une babiole à un client.
description.italian: Vendi un ammennicolo a un cliente.
description.spanish: Vende una baratija a un cliente.
description.russian: Продайте вещицу клиенту.
description.brazilian: Venda uma bugiganga para um cliente.

description.english: Clean 100 trinkets.
description.german: Schrubbe 100-mal Klimbim.
description.french: Nettoyer 100 babioles.
description.italian: Pulisci 100 ammennicoli.
description.spanish: Limpia 100 baratijas.
description.russian: Очистите 100 вещиц.
description.brazilian: Limpe 100 bugigangas.

description.english: Uncover 100 trinkets.
description.german: Lege 100-mal Klimbim frei.
description.french: Découvrir 100 babioles.
description.italian: Scopri 100 ammennicoli.
description.spanish: Descubre 100 baratijas.
description.russian: Обколите 100 вещиц.
description.brazilian: Descubra 100 bugigangas.

displayName.english: Beauty Is In The Eye Of The Upcycler
displayName.french: La beauté est dans l’œil de la surcycleuse
displayName.spanish: La belleza está en el supraciclaje
displayName.brazilian: A beleza está nos olhos do renovador

description.english: Upcycle 100 trinkets.
description.german: Bessere 100-mal Klimbim auf.
description.french: Surcycler 100 babioles.
description.italian: Riqualifica 100 ammennicoli.
description.spanish: Supracicla 100 baratijas.
description.russian: Соберите 100 вещиц.
description.brazilian: Renove 100 bugigangas.

description.english: Sell 100 trinkets.
description.german: Verkaufe 100-mal Klimbim.
description.french: Vendre 100 babioles.
description.italian: Vendi 100 ammennicoli.
description.spanish: Vende 100 baratijas.
description.russian: Продайте 100 вещиц.
description.brazilian: Venda 100 bugigangas.

description.english: Upgrade one of your tools.
description.german: Werte eins deiner Werkzeuge auf.
description.french: Améliorer l'un de vos outils.
description.italian: Potenzia uno dei tuoi strumenti.
description.spanish: Mejora una de tus herramientas.
description.russian: Улучшите один из инструментов.
description.brazilian: Melhore uma de suas ferramentas.

description.english: Complete the tutorial.
description.german: Schließ das Tutorial ab.
description.french: Compléter le tutoriel.
description.italian: Completa il tutorial.
description.spanish: Completa el tutorial.
description.russian: Завершите обучение.
description.brazilian: Conclua o tutorial.

description.english: Save Aimon's soul from the armoire lich.
description.german: Rette Aimons Seele vor der Lich-Armoire.
description.french: Sauver l'âme d'Aimon de la liche de l'armoire.
description.italian: Salva l'anima di Aimon dal lich dell'armario.
description.spanish: Salva el alma de Aimon del liche del armario.
description.russian: Вырвите душу Амони из ручек мебельного лича.
description.polish: Spraw, że Aimon nie odda duszy liczowi z szafy.
description.brazilian: Salve a alma de Aimon do lich do armário.

description.english: Upgrade your Aunty's Delver Licence.
description.german: Werte Tantchens Prospektoratslizenz auf.
description.french: Mettre à niveau le permis de creuseur de Tatie.
description.italian: Aggiorna la licenza di esplorazione della zietta.
description.spanish: Actualiza el permiso de exploración de la tita.
description.russian: Улучшите тётушкину лицензию копача.
description.brazilian: Atualize a licença de escavador da sua Tia.

description.english: Ask the Hullifers to retrieve a trinket via the Fetching Fungi Beta Program.
description.german: Lass die Röhrlichs Klimbim im Umtriebige Pilz-Sendungen-Programm beschaffen.
description.french: Demandez une babiole aux Hullifers via le programme bêta des Champirapporteurs.
description.italian: Aderisci al programma di prova dei Micercatori per recuperare un ammennicolo.
description.spanish: Pide a los Hullifers que recuperen una baratija con el programa de prueba de las Setas Recolectoras.
description.russian: Попросите Халлиферов достать вещицу через бета-версию программы «Грибная доставка».
description.polish: Zamów świecidełko od Hulliferów za pomocą beta programu Grzybodawanie.
description.brazilian: Peça uma bugiganga aos Hullifers pelo programa beta do Buscamelo.

displayName.italian: A zonzo per la Città d'argento
displayName.spanish: De paseo por Ciudad de Plata

description.english: Take Aimon's cart and visit a new district.
description.german: Besuch mit Aimons Karren ein neues Viertel.
description.french: Prendre la charrette d'Aimon pour visiter un nouveau quartier.
description.italian: Prendi il carretto di Aimon e visita un nuovo distretto.
description.spanish: Usa el carro de Aimon y visita un nuevo distrito.
description.russian: Возьмите повозку Амони и побывайте в новом районе.
description.polish: Odwiedź nową dzielnicę, gdy Aimon pożyczy ci wóz.
description.brazilian: Pegue o carrinho de Aimon e visite um novo distrito.

displayName.french: On ne regarde pas à la dépense
displayName.spanish: Con ganas de ampliar el negocio

description.english: Purchase an item from expansion mode.
description.german: Kaufe einen Gegenstand im Ausbaumodus.
description.french: Acheter un objet du mode Expansion.
description.italian: Acquista un oggetto dalla modalità Espansione.
description.spanish: Compra un objeto del modo ampliación.
description.russian: Купите предмет в режиме расширения.
description.brazilian: Compre um objeto do modo expansão.

displayName.polish: Nie ma to jak w domu

description.english: Decorate your home with an option from customisation mode.
description.german: Dekoriere dein Heim im Höhlggeligmodus.
description.french: Décorer votre intérieur avec une option depuis le mode Personnalisation
description.italian: Decora la tua bottega con un'opzione della modalità Personalizzazione.
description.spanish: Decora tu casa con un elemento del modo personalización.
description.russian: Украсьте дом чем-то в режиме обустройства.
description.polish: Udekoruj dom, używając opcji z trybu personalizacji.
description.brazilian: Decore sua casa com uma opção do modo personalização.

description.english: Sell a trinket for at least 500 Gold.
description.german: Verkaufe ein Stück Klimbim für mindestens 500 Gold.
description.french: Vendre une babiole pour au moins 500 pièces d'or.
description.italian: Vendi un ammennicolo per almeno 500 zecchini.
description.spanish: Vende una baratija por, al menos, 500 monedas de oro.
description.russian: Продайте вещицу за 500 зольдо или больше.
description.polish: Sprzedaj świecidełko za co najmniej 500 sztuk złota.
description.brazilian: Venda uma bugiganga por pelo menos 500 moedas de ouro.

description.english: Sell a trinket for at least 1000 Gold.
description.german: Verkaufe ein Stück Klimbim für mindestens 1000 Gold.
description.french: Vendre une babiole pour au moins 1000 pièces d'or.
description.italian: Vendi un ammennicolo per almeno 1.000 zecchini.
description.spanish: Vende una baratija por, al menos, 1000 monedas de oro.
description.russian: Продайте вещицу за 1000 зольдо или более.
description.polish: Sprzedaj świecidełko za co najmniej 1000 sztuk złota.
description.brazilian: Venda uma bugiganga por pelo menos 1.000 moedas de ouro.

description.english: Close the shop for 3 days.
description.german: Halte den Laden 3 Tage lang geschlossen.
description.french: Fermer la boutique pendant 3 jours.
description.italian: Chiudi bottega per tre giorni.
description.spanish: Cierra la tienda durante 3 días.
description.russian: Закройте лавку на 3 дня.
description.brazilian: Feche a loja por 3 dias.

description.english: Spend a whole day doing nothing but Chipping.
description.german: Verbringe einen ganzen Tag nur mit Meißeln.
description.french: Passer une journée entière à buriner.
description.italian: Trascorri un'intera giornata solo a scalpellare.
description.spanish: Pasa un día entero sin hacer otra cosa que cincelar.
description.russian: Проведите весь день исключительно за обкалыванием.
description.polish: Spędź cały dzień, nie robiąc nic poza łupaniem.
description.brazilian: Passe um dia inteiro fazendo nada além de cinzelar.

description.english: Spend a whole day doing nothing but Cleaning.
description.german: Verbringe einen ganzen Tag nur mit Schrubben.
description.french: Passer une journée entière à nettoyer.
description.italian: Trascorri un'intera giornata solo a pulire.
description.spanish: Pasa un día entero sin hacer otra cosa que limpiar.
description.russian: Проведите весь день исключительно за чисткой.
description.polish: Spędź cały dzień, nie robiąc nic poza czyszczeniem.
description.brazilian: Passe um dia inteiro fazendo nada além de limpar.

description.english: Spend a whole day doing nothing but Upcycling.
description.german: Verbringe einen ganzen Tag nur mit Aufbessern.
description.french: Passer une journée entière à surcycler.
description.italian: Trascorri un'intera giornata solo a riqualificare.
description.spanish: Pasa un día entero sin hacer otra cosa que supraciclar.
description.russian: Проведите весь день исключительно за сборкой.
description.polish: Spędź cały dzień, nie robiąc nic poza przerabianiem.
description.brazilian: Passe um dia inteiro fazendo nada além de renovar.

displayName.polish: Coś dla ciała, coś dla ducha

description.english: Help the Spirit of Lost Things build a new body and see the results.
description.german: Hilf dem Geist der verlorenen Dinge, einen neuen Körper zu schaffen, und begutachte das Resultat.
description.french: Aider à construire un corps à l'Esprit des choses perdues et voir le résultat.
description.italian: Aiuta lo Spirito degli oggetti smarriti col suo nuovo corpo e scopri cosa succede.
description.spanish: Ayuda al Espíritu de las Cosas Perdidas a crear un cuerpo nuevo y observa los resultados.
description.russian: Помогите Духу потерянных вещей обрести тело и оцените результат.
description.polish: Pomóż Duchowi Zaginionych Rzeczy zbudować nowe ciało i zobacz efekty.
description.brazilian: Ajude o Espírito dos Achados e Perdidos a construir um corpo novo e ver os resultados.
